nodes.text: Atenna Olypo was a Rutian Twi'lek female who negotiated smuggling routes near the neutral world of Arthuria during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. However, in 21 BBY, the Arthurians considered an alliance with the Republic, jeopardizing Olypo's business venture. As such, Republic Senator Padmé Amidala feared that the Twi'lek might try to disturb her scheduled meeting with Arthurian delegates. As a precaution, Amidala asked Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano to protect her and her guests during the meeting. To prepare Tano for the task, Amidala showed her a datapad displaying a picture of Olypo and alerted her of the possible threat.
Atenna Olypo had red eyes and blue skin, and she wore a gray collar and a gold-black headdress.

A picture of Atenna Olypo appeared in the one-shot comic-book Star Wars: Forces of Destiny—Ahsoka & Padmé, published by IDW Publishing on January 24, 2018. The comic was written by Beth Revis and illustrated by Valentina Pinto.
